newsitem.title: UK: RESEARCH ALERT-Kleinwort reviews UK banks,ups HSBC.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT-Kleinwort reviews UK banks,ups HSBC.

text.p: Brokerage Dresdner Kleinwort Benson raised its targets for HSBC Holdings Plc and Lloyds TSB Group Plc on Tuesday and repeated its negative stance on National Westminster Bank, dealers said.

In a 100-page sector review ahead of results, the brokerage raised its share price target for HSBC and Lloyds to 2400p from 2100p and to 830p from 780p, respectively, dealers said. The upgrades were mainly linked to valuations, they said.
The brokerage also upgraded Standard Chartered Plc and Barclays Plc to "add" from "hold," they said.
